" , & testcase ) ; for ( k = 0 ; k < testcase ; k ++ ) { scanf ( "%d
" , & i ) ; for ( row = 0 ; row < i ; row ++ ) { for ( j = 0 ; j <= row ; j ++ ) { scanf ( "
%d" , & a [ row ] [ j ] ) ; } } } for ( row = i - 1 ; row > 0 ; row -- ) { for ( j = 0 ; j < row ; j ++ ) { a [ row - 1 ] [ j ] = a [ row - 1 ] [ j ] + a [ row ] [ j ] > a [ row - 1 ] [ j ] + a [ row ] [ j + 1 ] ? a [ row - 1 ] [ j ] + a [ row ] [ j ] : a [ row - 1 ] [ j ] + a [ row ] [ j + 1 ] ; } } printf ( "%d" , a [ 0 ] [ 0 ] ) ; return 0 ; }
